line.comment: * Squadrons are AI fleets. It contains arrays of ship leaders and the key is an arbitrary string describing the squadron type.
* Alert is a table of sectors, in which something happened. It contains the playtime of the latest attack on an object (ship or station).
* Blacklist contains sector, station or ware. [TRUE] if it exists.
* Reserves are used to store ships that have been captured by Tugs. The player can buy them from a mission, and the AI can use them.
* Debts is a table of wares containing an amount that the AI must pay if the debt system is activated.

* Reprisal is a table of races that contains a RelValue of ships that the race has destroyed through Task Forces. Owner's Task Forces will try to balance things out by killing the same amount of RelValue.
* Truce is a table of race with which we have a truce. The value is the time at which the truce has been signed.
* Diplomatic favors are granted to players. $favor is a table whose key is the name of the favor and the value its timeout.

* Interorbital storage is a feature that allows to store resources "out of the galaxy". Key = ware, value = quantity. WARNING: the whole system currently only works for the player, see Mayhem.TIS... scripts.
* Coalition is a table of races against which we are in coalition. 1 means that the faction WANTS to form a coalition, 2 means that the coalitions already exists.
* ZH 2.0 - no default space weed blacklist for the player faction
* Set all auto rename options to on.
* ZH 2.0 - now we differentiate between small and big groups
* Herobetty 5.4: initialize black market ships arrays. Do this in the helper script.

sval.val: Init mayhem_galaxy global var.
Faction tables.
Squadrons are AI fleets. It contains arrays of ship leaders and the key is an arbitrary string describing the squadron type.
Mordan9 added raider fleet squadron.
Alert is a table of sectors, in which something happened. It contains the playtime of the latest attack on an object (ship or station).
Blacklist contains sector, station or ware. [TRUE] if it exists.
Reserves are used to store ships that have been captured by Tugs. The player can buy them from a mission, and the AI can use them.
Debts is a table of wares containing an amount that the AI must pay if the debt system is activated.

Reprisal is a table of races that contains a RelValue of ships that the race has destroyed through Task Forces. Owner's Task Forces will try to balance things out by killing the same amount of RelValue.
Truce is a table of race with which we have a truce. The value is the time at which the truce has been signed.
Diplomatic favors are granted to players. $favor is a table whose key is the name of the favor and the value its timeout.

Interorbital storage is a feature that allows to store resources "out of the galaxy". Key = ware, value = quantity. WARNING: the whole system currently only works for the player, see Mayhem.TIS... scripts.
Favor point reduction.
Loyalty (to order NPC ships).
Coalition is a table of races against which we are in coalition. 1 means that the faction WANTS to form a coalition, 2 means that the coalitions already exists.
Blacklist Waste for everyone.
ZH 2.0 - no default space weed blacklist for the player faction
Set all auto rename options to on.
Missions (see Mayhem.Mission.Generate).
Research milestones.
Difficulties are: easier, normal, harder.
ZH 2.0 - now we differentiate between small and big groups
Herobetty 5.4: initialize black market ships arrays. Do this in the helper script.
